entry.title: Introducing a strong VLM FIRE with a powerful feedback-refinement capability.

link.title: Introducing a strong VLM FIRE with a powerful feedback-refinement capability.

entry.content:
Can VLMs refine their responses based on user feedback spontaneously❓

Introducing 🔥FIRE: A Dataset for Feedback Integration and Refinement Evaluation of Multimodal Models.

  • 👉 Project: https://mm-fire.github.io Feel free to leave a message to me, if you have issues about the code.
entry.summary: Can VLMs refine their responses based on user feedback spontaneously❓
